mapper.select: SELECT CODE_TYPE, COMMON_CODE, PROGRAM_CONSTANTS, DEFAULT_YN, DESCRIPTION_EN, DESCRIPTION_KO, TO_CHAR(INSERT_DATE, 'yyyymmddhh24miss') AS INSERT_DATE, INSERT_USER_ID, SORT_ORDER, TO_CHAR(UPDATE_DATE, 'yyyymmddhh24miss') AS UPDATE_DATE, UPDATE_USER_ID, USE_YN FROM ZEBRA_COMMON_CODE WHERE 1 = 1 ${auto_fill} ${frameworkGeneratedWhere} ${frameworkGeneratedOrderBy} FOR UPDATE
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ZEBRA_COMMON_CODE ( CODE_TYPE, COMMON_CODE, PROGRAM_CONSTANTS, DEFAULT_YN, DESCRIPTION_EN, DESCRIPTION_KO, INSERT_DATE, INSERT_USER_ID, SORT_ORDER, UPDATE_DATE, UPDATE_USER_ID, USE_YN ) VALUES ( ${CODE_TYPE}, ${COMMON_CODE}, ${PROGRAM_CONSTANTS}, ${DEFAULT_YN}, ${DESCRIPTION_EN}, ${DESCRIPTION_KO}, ${INSERT_DATE}, ${INSERT_USER_ID}, ${SORT_ORDER}, ${UPDATE_DATE}, ${UPDATE_USER_ID}, ${USE_YN} )

INSERT INTO ZEBRA_COMMON_CODE ( CODE_TYPE, COMMON_CODE, PROGRAM_CONSTANTS, DEFAULT_YN, DESCRIPTION_EN, DESCRIPTION_KO, INSERT_DATE, INSERT_USER_ID, SORT_ORDER, UPDATE_DATE, UPDATE_USER_ID, USE_YN ) VALUES ( #{codeType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{commonCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{programConstants,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{defaultYn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{descriptionEn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{descriptionKo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{insertDate,jdbcType=TIME}, #{insertUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sortOrder,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIME}, #{updateUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{useYn,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
mapper.update: UPDATE ZEBRA_COMMON_CODE SET PROGRAM_CONSTANTS = ${PROGRAM_CONSTANTS}, DEFAULT_YN = ${DEFAULT_YN}, DESCRIPTION_EN = ${DESCRIPTION_EN}, DESCRIPTION_KO = ${DESCRIPTION_KO}, INSERT_DATE = ${INSERT_DATE}, INSERT_USER_ID = ${INSERT_USER_ID}, SORT_ORDER = ${SORT_ORDER}, UPDATE_DATE = ${UPDATE_DATE}, UPDATE_USER_ID = ${UPDATE_USER_ID}, USE_YN = ${USE_YN} WHERE 1 = 1 ${frameworkGeneratedWhere}

UPDATE ZEBRA_COMMON_CODE SET PROGRAM_CONSTANTS = #{programConstants,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DEFAULT_YN = #{defaultYn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DESCRIPTION_EN = #{descriptionEn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DESCRIPTION_KO = #{descriptionKo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, INSERT_DATE = #{insertDate,jdbcType=TIME}, INSERT_USER_ID = #{insertUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SORT_ORDER = #{sortOrder,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UPDATE_DATE = #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIME}, UPDATE_USER_ID = #{updateUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, USE_YN = #{useYn,jdbcType=VARCHAR} WHERE 1 = 1 ${additionalAttributesForUpdateWithDto}
